paper.title: Large portfolio optimisation approaches
paper.abstract: This paper makes an empirical comparison of prominent methods in portfolio optimisation, such as nodewise regression, the sample covariance matrix, observable factor model-based covariance matrices, linear and nonlinear shrinkage methods, and principal orthogonal complement thresholding (POET) estimators. Empirically, we find that the nodewise regression approach that uses a direct estimator of the sparse inverse covariance matrix improves portfolio performance among existing methods in mean-variance portfolio optimisation when the number of stocks is greater than the number of observations.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要比较了多种投资组合优化方法，如均值-方差优化和协方差矩阵估计方法，并评估了它们在投资组合绩效上的表现，这直接属于投资组合管理的研究领域。
